Hero.title: Quality Frontend Development
Hero.subtitle: I specialize in developing dynamic, user-friendly websites and apps that elevate user experience, optimize performance, and drive business growth.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: I have successfully completed several projects that have contributed to client growth.
Projects.description_portfolio2024: My current portfolio, focusing on meticulous details and a minimalist innovative design.
Projects.description_laLiga: I developed a website for real-time coverage of La Liga, featuring live scores, standings, and video highlights
Projects.description_aprobatus: A website that generated over 17,000 information requests in its first year, proving the effectiveness of its design and functionality.
Projects.description_campusVirtual: A multi-page website for a virtual campus with over 3,000 students, including private messaging, calendars, and online classes, enhancing the educational experience.
Projects.description_crossfit: Developed a website tailored to the client's needs, focused on design, for a CrossFit company.
